TopicTitle: Check out this awesome racer (+shameless brag)

Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

This has got to be (apart from KSP) my favourite game at the moment, it's called Race the Sun and in many ways (excluding being good) it's the complete opposite of KSP, so perfect for some variation. It's fast, requires little thinking or planning and is almost completely reflex/twitch based. It's available on Steam for a few bucks from a nice indie dev (two guys) and IMO it gets far too little love. So I try to spread a little.

Also, apparently I'm sort of good at it. Check it out!
